ygData.subject: RE: RE: Simply Charming...
ygData.msgSnippet: Looking at AllaKhazam s, my skullcap isn t even listed.  The halfing only version listed has better stats, but then again, I m only interested in the Charisma
ygData.messageBody:
Looking at AllaKhazam's, my skullcap isn't even listed. The halfing only
version listed has better stats, but then again, I'm only interested in the
Charisma and the fact I can wear it :-).

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Jeff Illian [mailto:jeff@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, December 14, 1999 12:56 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] RE: Simply Charming...
>
>
> From: "Jeff Illian" <jeff@...>
>
> I'm in the same boat. My guild leader gave it to me and I'm having no
> problems wearing it (I'm a wood elf). Might be a pre-patch version of
> another drop? I'm not complaining :-).
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: kim@... [mailto:kim@...]
> > Sent: Tuesday, December 14, 1999 12:43 PM
> > To: eqbards@onelist.com
> > Subject: RE: [eqbards] RE: Simply Charming...
> >
> >
> > From: <kim@...>
> >

> >
> > > From: "Jeff Illian" <jeff@...>
> > >
> > > What's drops the Siryn Hood? I currently use a leatherfoot
> > skullcap (+10
> > > Cha, AC4).
> >
> > Non-halflings can still equip those? Or was it another
> > guise-job where the old ones remain but new ones are
> > halfling-only?
> >
> > --
> > John H. Kim
